Introduction

Android 6 is the most stable android platform version.

To add this platform, type the following in your terminal

ionic cordova platform add android@6

Possible Bugs

MERGE DEX ERROR WHEN BULDING OR RUNNING APP

In your terminal, type the following:

cordova plugin add --save https://github.com/jwall149/cordova-multidex

If you added facebook plugin, change version to
4.25.0

Then, in your terminal, run

cordova clean

InvalidClassPath when building app

Replace this on your project.gradle

allprojects { repositories { maven { url "https://maven.google.com" } jcenter

ERROR ON MAX MEMORY WHEN BUILDING

node --max-old-space-size=4096 $(which ionic) cordova build android --prod
